/* Firefox */

}

.footer {
  position: fixed;
  left: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  width: 100%;
  background-color: #f5f3fa;
  color: #5c2d91;
  text-align: center;
  font-size: 9pt;
  border-top: 1px solid #5c2d91;
}

.destek_btn{
  position: fixed;
  bottom: 24px;
  right: 24px;
  display: inline-block;
  font-size: 10px;
  font-weight: bold;
  background: #5c2d91;
  border-radius: 50px;
  border: 0;
  box-shadow: 1px 1px 1px #a084ca;
  z-index: 999;
  padding: 9px;
  color:#fff;
  opacity: 0.9;
}

.destek_btn:hover{
	color:#fff;
	background: #7c4dff;
}

</style>
